hero.title: Easily create official documents with AI
hero.subtitle: Write applications, complaints, CVs and other documents in three languages (Uzbek, Russian, English) in seconds
hero.features: Create, edit and download documents with AI

card1.title: Select document types
card1.description: Choose the required document type and use templates in three languages (Uzbek, Russian, English)

card2.title: Enter context
card2.description: Enter the necessary information for the document or ask AI to create a document

card3.title: Edit and download the document
card3.description: Edit the document created with AI and download it in the required format

templates.title: Document Templates
templates.noResults: No templates found matching your search.
